author: taylor
msg: rolling back change. Mistakenly under impression tokenizer was modifying source string.
My bug must be somewhere else, still trying to resolve it

author: blumm
msg: The method getContentType of ServletRequestImpl.java had built-in a limitation to mime type "text/html". This limitation is not necessary.
getContentType() has been removed. The parent method getContentType() from HttpServletRequestWrapper  will be used instead.

author: blumm
msg: ActionRequestImpl.getReader has been deleted, because it only calls the same signature of its parent, which will happen anyway.

author: blumm
msg: The signatures of the java interfaces PreferenceCtrl.setValues and PreferenceSetCtrl.add did not reflect the 'ordered' aspect as defined for preferenceType in the portlet-app.xsd
I have changed the signatures now to use "java.util.List" instead of "java.util.Collection" and fixed the implementation accordingly.
